hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: Did you know that Dark Link's max health is equal to @'s max health?

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Fire Temple Small Key#.
